NT_113949.2: 11
NC_012920.1: 37
total count 54099/60959
This is the end.


let seqidArray = [];
let count = [];
let totalCount = 0;
let flag = false;

gff.parseFile('/Users/ziyizhang/Desktop/Joint Institude/BioStatistics/3D_Genome/data/ref_GRCh38.p12_top_level.gff3', { parseAll: true })
.on('data', data => {
  if (data.directive) {
    //console.log('got a directive',data)
  }
  else if (data.comment) {
    //console.log('got a comment',data)
  }
  else if (data.sequence) {
    //console.log('got a sequence from a FASTA section')
  }
  else {
      if (data[0]["type"] == "gene" || data[0]["type"] == "pseudogene") {

      flag = false;
      for (let i=0; i<seqidArray.length; i++) {

          if (seqidArray[i] == data[0]["seq_id"]) {

              flag = true;
              count[i]++;
              totalCount++;
              break;
          }
      }
      if (flag == false) {

          seqidArray.push(data[0]["seq_id"]);
          count[count.length] = 1;
          totalCount++;
      }

      }
  }
})
.on("end", function () {
    console.log(">>>>>>>>>> seqidArray");
    for (let i=0; i<seqidArray.length; i++) {

        console.log(seqidArray[i] + ": " + String(count[i]) );
    }

    console.log("total count" + String(totalCount));
    console.log("This is the end.");
});
